contentMixtureDbId.description: the unique identifier for a content mixture

crossDbId.description: The unique DbId for a cross contained in this seed lot

crossName.description: The human readable name for a cross contained in this seed lot

germplasmDbId.description: The unique DbId of the Germplasm contained in this Seed Lot

germplasmName.description: The human readable name of the Germplasm contained in this Seed Lot

mixturePercentage.description: The percentage of the given germplasm in the seed lot mixture.
